results.name: a(n) = A048673(n) mod 3.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
formula: a(n) = 0 iff A292250(n) is odd, or equally, iff both A291759(n) and A304759(n) are even.
a(n) = 1 iff A304759(n) is odd, or equally, iff both A291759(n) and A292250(n) are even.
program: A003961(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); }; \\ From A003961
xref: Cf. A007395 (even bisection), A341346 (odd bisection), A341347.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 09 2021
